profile.title: Kōtaha Kaiwhakamahi
profile.mustLogin: Me takiuru koe kia tiro ai i ngā tautuhinga.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Whakaatu te taketake me te whakamāoritanga
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Whakaatu te taketake i te taha o te whakamāoritanga
profile.saveError: Hapa: Kāore i taea te tiaki i ngā tautuhinga
profile.noPrivateKey: Kāore he kī tūmataiti i tēnei pūrere hei kaweake.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tautuhia he kupuhipa hei whakamuna i tō pūrua:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Tāurua te kupuhipa mō tēnei pūrua:
profile.importSuccess: Kua kawemai te kī tūmataiti ki tēnei pūrere.
profile.importFailed: I rahua te kawemai kī (kupuhipa hē, kōnae pirau rānei).
profile.keysRotated: Kua waihangatia he takirua kī hou, kua tuku ake te kī tūmatanui.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kāore rawa tō kī tūmataiti e wehe i tēnei pūrere. Kaweake he kape kua whakamunatia mā te kupuhipa kia taea ai te whakaora ki tētahi atu pūrere.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kei te mahere Free koe—whakamahia ngā kōwhiringa Rā/Marama i raro iho. Whakahōu kia huaki mai ngā kaupapa katoa.
profile.backupTitle: Ngā Pūrua Kua Whakamunatia & Tukutahi Pūrere
profile.backupDesc: Waihanga ngā pūrua kua whakamunatia o ō kī, ā, whakahokia ki tētahi atu pūrere hei tukutahi.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Kōmarutia ngā karere mā te taunoa
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Kōmaru ina kore te taupānga e arotahi
profile.notifyOnCopy: Whakamōhio mai mēnā ka tāruatia taku karere
profile.followHint: Ka puta ā rātou kōrero ki tō Pūreitanga Whai mēnā ka whakaputa rātou ki te hunga ‘Ngā Kaiwhai’ (rānei ‘Tūmatanui’).
profile.followsYou: Kei te whai i a koe
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: I rahua te uta o te wāhanga
profile.sectionCrashedBody: I hapa tētahi mea i tēnei wāhanga.
profile.forwarding: Tuku Whakamua Waea me ngā Kupu
profile.callTextForwardingSection: Tuku Whakamua Waea me ngā Kupu
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tukua ngā waea me ngā karere kuhu kia tukuna whakamua ki tō waea, īmēra kua manatoko. Ka taea te whakaatu i tō tau Chatforia mō ngā waea/karere putanga.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Tukuna ngā karere ki te waea
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Tukuna ngā karere ki te īmēra
profile.forwardSaved: Kua tiakina ngā tautuhinga tuku whakamua
profile.forwardSaveFailed: I rahua te tiaki i ngā tautuhinga
profile.errE164: Tāurua he tau waea E.164 whaimana (hei tauira, +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Kōwhiria kia kotahi te ūnga (waea, īmēra rānei).
profile.errQuietHours: Me noho ngā hāora waikī ki waenga i te 0 me te 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Kōwhiria tētahi kuputuhi, rūma kōrerorero rānei kia tīmata ai te kōrero
chat.emptySubtitle: Tukua he karere kia tīmata ai te kōrerorero.

status.maxTooltip: Mō te 7 rā te roa rawa
status.filesNote: Tae atu ki te 5 kōnae. 24h te paunga taunoa.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Takiurua kia whakatika i ō tautuhinga.

premium.heading: Haere ki te Premium
premium.description: Wewete i ngā āhuatanga kaha & tango pānuitanga.

auth.headline: Kōrerorero haumaru, ao whānui me te whakamāori inamata
auth.description: Whakamunatanga mutunga-ki-te-mutunga, whakamāori ā-AI, karere ngaro-aunoa, me ngā waea reo/ataata.
auth.desktopTip: Kei te rorohiko papamahi? Matawai mā tō waea kia tiki i te taupānga.

headlineAlt.highlight: e kōrero ana i tō reo

auth.subhead: Karere tūmataiti, kua whakamunatia, kua whakamāoritia — inamata.
auth.tip: Ka taea te whakamahi i a Chatforia i ngā pūrere katoa — ā, tikiake te taupānga mō te wheako pai rawa.
auth.scanHint: Matawai kia tikiake i te taupānga, kia whakatuwhera rānei ki tō pūtirotiro.

home.title: Kāinga
home.subheader: Tukua he karere kia tīmata ai te kōrerorero.

press.title: Pāpāho
press.contact: Mō ngā pātai pāpāho, tuku īmēra ki press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Mō ngā pātai pāpāho, whakapā mai ki press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: He karere haumaru a Chatforia me te whakamāori inamata me te whakamunatanga mutunga-ki-te-mutunga, kia māmā ai ngā kōrero tūmataiti puta i te ao.
press.assetsText: Ngā tohu, ngā mata-whakaahua, me ngā whakaahua hua (e haere ake nei).

careers.title: Ngā Tūranga Mahi
careers.intro: He rōpū iti mātou e hanga ana i tētahi karere tūmataiti, ao whānui. Mēnā he ngākau nui ōu ki te whakamunatanga, te āheitanga, me te UX reka, koa whakapā mai.
careers.openRoles: Ngā tūranga wātea: Pūmanawa (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Hua, Tautoko.
careers.apply: Me pēhea te tono: Tukuna tō rētā/nga hononga ki jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Mō Chatforia
about.description: He karere maha-reo, haumaru a Chatforia me te whakamunatanga mutunga-ki-te-mutunga, te whakamāori inamata, me ngā waea reo/ataata. Ko tā mātou whāinga: kia hono ngā tāngata—mārire, tūmataiti, ā-reo kē.

values.control: Mana whakahaere: He kōwhiringa ngā karere ngaro-aunoa & ngā tohu pānui.

about.howTitle: Me pēhea a Chatforia e mahi ai
about.howDescription: Ka whakamunatia ngā karere i tō pūrere i mua i te tukuna. Kua hoahoatia te whakamāori, ngā pūrua, me te tukutahi kia iti rawa ngā raraunga ka kitea e ā mātou tūmau.

advertise.title: Pānuitia ki Chatforia
advertise.description: Toro atu ki ngā kaiwhakamahi karere kaha mā ngā tūnga ātaahua, haumaru-waitohu. Kei a mātou ngā pānui ārahi i ngā wāhi kitea, ngā tautoko, me ngā whakatairanga whare. Kāore ngā ohaurunga Premium e kite pānuitanga.

adsense.withPubId: Kei te tuku pānui mātou mā Google AdSense. Mēnā e hiahia ana koe ki te ūnga mā Google Ads, whakamahia te ID kaiwhakaputa {{pubId}} ā, tonoa he whakatakotoranga whakahaere ki ā mātou wae i raro. Kei te wātea ngā tautoko tika—whakamahia te puka.
adsense.noPubId: Kei te tuku pānui mātou mā Google AdSense. Kei te wātea hoki ngā tautoko tika—whakamahia te puka i raro.

advertise.noPlacements: Kāore anō kia whirihorahia he wāhi. Tāpiritia ki ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: He nui te auautanga/noho wā i te atanga kōrerorero
why.brandSafe: He hōputu haumaru-waitohu; he herenga auautanga whai mana
why.sponsoredMoments: He ‘moments’ tautokona (hei tauira, “Tīmata he Kōrerorero”) kei te wātea
why.deals: Ngā kirimana tika, ā, mā AdSense/Google Ads rānei

form.submittedMsg: Ngā mihi! Kei te haere tō pātai. Ka whai ake mātou ākuanei.
form.missingRequired: Whakakī koa i te ingoa, te īmēra, me te karere.
form.successToast: Ngā mihi! Ka hono atu mātou ākuanei.
form.mailtoInfo: Kei te whakatuwhera i tō īmēra hei tuku i te pātai…

legal.disclaimerStart: Mā te tuku, ka whakaae koe ki ā mātou

upgrade.title: Whakahōu
upgrade.subtitle: Kōwhiria te mahere tika māu: tangohia ngā pānui mā te Plus, rānei whiwhi i ngā āhuatanga kaha katoa mā te Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Ka mutu te ohaurunga
scheduleBanner.body: Ka hoki koe ki te Free i

free.title: Free
free.ctaUnavailable: Huri ki Free (kāore i te wātea)

features.sameFeatures: Ngā āhuatanga ōrite ki te Marama

gettingStarted.title: Tīmata Inaianei
gettingStarted.subtitle: He tauhou ki Chatforia? Mā tēnei aratohu tere koe e āwhina kia whai hua ā ngā meneti ruarua.

alert.text: Ka tipu tēnei aratohu i a mātou e whakarewa āhuatanga hou. Mēnā he mea ngaro, whakamōhiotia mā

section2.title: 2) Tīmata te karere
section2.item1: Waihanga he DM, he Rōpū rānei, ka tuku i tō karere tuatahi.
section2.item2: Whakamahia te whakamāori inamata kia kōrero ai i ngā reo 100+.
section2.item3: Whakamātauria ngā karere ngaro-aunoa me ngā tohu pānui i Kōtaha → Tūmataiti.

section3.title: 3) Haere whakamua
section3.item1Part1: Whakahaere i tō mahere ki te whārangi
section3.item2Part1: Honoa ētahi atu pūrere, ā, whakatū pūrua whakamunatia ki

account.q: Me pēhea te hanga, te whakahoki rānei i taku pūkete?
account.a: Tikiake te taupānga, whakamahia rānei te paetukutuku, pāwhiri “Waihanga pūkete”, manatoko i tō īmēra/waea. Hei whakahoki, whakamahia “Kua wareware te kupuhipa”.

privacy.a: Āe. Kua whakamunatia mā te taunoa ngā karere me ngā waea. Ko koe anake me te kaiwhiwhi ka taea te pānui.

translate.q: Me pēhea te mahi a te whakamāori inamata?
translate.a: Whakahohe “Whakamaori-aunoa” i Tautuhinga → Āhua & Reo. Ka whakamāoritia ki te pūrere ina tautokona; ki ngā API haumaru rānei me te iti rawa o ngā raraunga.

contact.a: Whakapā mai ki support@chatforia.com. Tāpiri mata-ā-whakaahua me tō putanga taupānga.

contact.title: Whakapā Mai
contact.successMsg: Ngā mihi—mā te īmēra mātou e whakautu.
contact.errorSend: Kāore i taea te tuku. Tēnā, īmērahia support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: E whakamārama ana tēnei Kaupapa Here Tūmataiti me pēhea a Chatforia (“mātou”) e kohikohi, e whakamahi, e tiri pārongo ana i a koe e whakamahi ana i ā mātou taupānga me ngā ratonga. Ka hoahoa mātou i a Chatforia kia iti rawa te raraunga ka taea e mātou te uru.

infoWeCollect.title: Ngā pārongo ka kohia
infoWeCollect.account: Pārongo pūkete (hei tauira, īmēra/waea) hei waihanga, hei whakamaru i tō pūkete.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ko te ihirangi kua whakamunatia (karere/waea) he mutunga-ki-te-mutunga; kāore mātou e taea te pānui.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Rīpoata hapa/whakamahi pērā i ngā rangitaki pakaru, momo pūrere, me ngā tātaritanga māmā hei whakapai mahi.

howWeUse.title: Me pēhea mātou e whakamahi ai
howWeUse.provide: Hei tuku, hei whakamaru i te ratonga (takiuru, kite mahi kino/raupatu).
howWeUse.legal: Hei ū ki ngā herenga ā-ture.

sharing.title: Te tiritiri
sharing.body: Kāore mātou e hoko raraunga whaiaro. Tērā pea ka tiritiria he raraunga iti ki ngā kaiwhakarato ratonga (pēnei i te pana pānui, tātaritanga) i raro i ngā kirimana pakari.

rights.title: Ō motika
rights.body: I runga i tō rohe (pēnei i te GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), tērā pea ka tono koe ki te uru, te whakatika, te muku, te aukati rānei i ētahi tukatuka. Whakapā: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Te rokiroki raraunga & te haumarutanga
retention.body: Ka rokiroki mātou i ngā mea e hiahiatia ana anake hei whakahaere i te ratonga, ā, ka whakamahi i ngā paerewa haumarutanga ahumahi. Kāore mātou e taea te wetemuna i te ihirangi M-ki-te-M.

children.title: Ngā tamariki
children.body: Ehara a Chatforia mā ngā tamariki i raro iho i te 13 tau (rānei e hiahiatia ana e tō ture ā-rohe).

changes.title: Ngā panonitanga
changes.body: Ka whakaputa mātou i konei ngā whakahōu me te whakahōu i te rā “Whakahōunga whakamutunga”.

intro.body: Mā te whakamahi i a Chatforia ka whakaae koe ki ēnei Ture. Ki te kore koe e whakaae, kaua e whakamahi i te ratonga.

accounts.title: Ngā pūkete
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tukua he pārongo tika, ā, puritia ngā kupuhipa kia haumaru.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Māu e kawe te haepapa mō ngā mahi i tō pūkete.

acceptableUse.title: Whakamahi whai tika
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Kaua e tuku ihirangi ture-kore, tukino, takahi rānei; kaua e spam, e mahi aunoa kino rānei.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tērā pea ka whakatārewatia/whakamutua mō ngā takahitanga.

yourContent.title: Tō ihirangi
yourContent.body: Nōu tonu ngā motika o tō ihirangi. Ka whakawhiwhia mai e koe ngā motika e hiahiatia ana hei whakahaere i te ratonga (pēnei i te whakawhiti, te rokiroki, te whakamāori).

disclaimer.title: Ngā whakakāhoretanga & te haepapa
disclaimer.body: Ka tukuna te ratonga “pērā i tōna āhua” me te kore taurangi. I te whānuitanga rawa o te ture, kāore a Chatforia e kawe haepapa mō ngā mate ka hua ake, whai-whakaritenga rānei.

changes.title: Ngā panonitanga
changes.body: Ka whakahōu pea mātou i ēnei ture; mā te whakamahi tonu i muri i ngā panoni ka tohu whakaae.

doNotSell.title: Kaua e Hoko, e Tiri rānei Aku Pārongo Whaiaro
doNotSell.body: Kāore a Chatforia e hoko pārongo whaiaro. Ka taea tonutia e ngā kainoho o California te tuku tono i raro i te CPRA mā te pātene i raro nei.

cookies.title: Tautuhinga Pihikete
cookies.body: He iti noa ngā pihikete a Chatforia (hei tauira, wātū, haumarutanga). Kāore mātou e whakamahi pihikete pānuitanga-tuatoru. Whakahaerehia ngā pihikete mā ngā tautuhinga o tō pūtirotiro.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Kāore i taea te uta i te tūnga tau waea.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Kāore anō he tau i tohua. Kōwhiria mā te waehere takiwā kia tīmata ai te tuku karere.

startChatModal.title: Tīmata he kōrerorero
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Tāuru ingoa, ingoa kaiwhakamahi, waea, īmēra rānei…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Tīmata kōrerorero me te hunga i kōwhiria
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Rapua mā te ingoa kaiwhakamahi, te waea rānei
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tāuru ingoa kaiwhakamahi, waea rānei, kātahi ka pēhi Rapua.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Ka wātea ngā tāurunga waea/īmēra i muri i te tiaki hei hoapā.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: I rahua te tīmata kōrerorero ki te hunga i kōwhiria.

sounds.freeNotice: Kei te mahere Free koe — e whakaaturia ana ngā oro premium engari kua raka. Whakahōu kia huaki katoa.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Me whai mahere Premium mō tēnei āhuatanga.

aiSettings.title: Ngā Tautuhinga AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Whakahaere whakamāori, whakautu atamai, me ngā whakautu-aunoa a ForiaBot.
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Whakaatu te taketake i te taha o te whakamāoritanga
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Tukuna ngā karere kua riro inā tata nei (kua purea) ki te AI hei tuku kupu whakautu tere.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Kāpia kupu kūare i ngā taunaki AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Ki te ‘on’, ka kāpia e te AI ngā kupu kua tohua
aiSettings.saveFailed: I rahua te tiaki i ngā tautuhinga AI
aiSettings.translateAll: Whakamaori i ngā karere kuhu katoa

accessibilitySettings.title: Āheitanga & Ngā Whakamōhiotanga
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ngā kōwhiringa hei māmā ake ai te whakamahi i a Chatforia me te kore e whakawhirinaki ki te oro.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Ka tīmata ki te rahi noa. Whakanuia mēnā he pai ki a koe te momotuhi nui ake.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Ngā pānui ā-kanohi mō ngā karere & waea
Whakaatu panui me te kōpī taitara kia kaua e mahue ngā mahi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Wiri i ngā karere hou (ina tautokona)
Whakahohe wiri pūrere me ngā whakamōhiotanga.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Whakamiramera te mata i te waea kuhu
He kanapa poto ina tangi te waea.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Tuhi-aunoa i ngā kōrero-reo
Āpitihia he tārua kupu ki ngā karere oro ka riro i a koe.
accessibilitySettings.loadFailed: I rahua te uta i ngā tautuhinga
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Ngā pānui ā-kanohi mō ngā karere & waea
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Whakaatu panui me te kōpī taitara kia kaua e mahue ngā mahi.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Wiri i ngā karere hou (ina tautokona)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Whakahohe wiri pūrere me ngā whakamōhiotanga.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: He kanapa poto ina tangi te waea.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Rokiroki anake i te tuhinga-kupu muna ki te tūmau. Ka mono i te AI/Whakamaori me ngā arokite aroturuki.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Ngā Pūrere Hono
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Kāore i kitea he pūrere hono.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Rapua mā te ingoa ingoamuna, te ingoa, te ingoa kaiwhakamahi, te waea rānei
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ētahi huarahi kia tere te anga whakamua.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Rapua mā te waea / ingoa kaiwhakamahi
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Tiria tō hono tono kia tīmata wawe ai te kōrero.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Noho hono i te haere mā Chatforia mō iOS me Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Tohutohu: Ka noho tukutahi ō karere puta noa i te paetukutuku me te pūkoro.

randomChat.title: Kōrerorero Matapōkere
randomChat.description: Tūtaki ki tētahi tāngata hou inamata. Mā mātou e taurite, ka whakatuwhera he rūma rangitahi.
randomChat.noPartner: Kāore he hoa i tēnei wā.
randomChat.saveGuard: Mō ngā kōrerorero tangata-ki-te-tangata anake te tiaki
